short_summary: Procurement of a motorized trailer dolly to 3 CDSB Wainwright Maintenance Section located at Denwood Alberta.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 24 November 2022 at 14 :00 EST. All bids submitted after 14 :00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply, delivery, and set-up of one (1) Motorized Trailer Dolly to 3 CDSB Wainwright Maintenance Section located at Denwood Alberta as per Annex A of the solicitation. This requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods.
